segment.source: How to use the Language Selection page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to choose the lanaguage for your IEAK 11 custom package.
segment.target: How to use the Language Selection page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to choose the lanaguage for your IEAK 11 custom package.

segment.source: Use the Language Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Language Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Language Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Language Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The Language Selection page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you choose the language for your Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) custom package.
segment.target: The Language Selection page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you choose the language for your Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) custom package.

segment.source: You can create custom Internet Explorer 11 packages in any of the languages your operating system version is available in.
segment.target: You can create custom Internet Explorer 11 packages in any of the languages your operating system version is available in.

segment.source: Make sure that the language of your IEAK 11 installation matches the language of your custom IE11 package.
segment.target: Make sure that the language of your IEAK 11 installation matches the language of your custom IE11 package.

segment.source: If the languages don’t match, IEAK 11 won’t work properly.
segment.target: If the languages don’t match, IEAK 11 won’t work properly.

segment.source: To use the Language Selection page
segment.target: To use the Language Selection page

segment.source: Pick the language you want your custom IE11 installation package to use.
segment.target: Pick the language you want your custom IE11 installation package to use.

segment.source: You can support as many languages as you want, but each localized version must be in its own install package.
segment.target: You can support as many languages as you want, but each localized version must be in its own install package.

segment.source: To keep your settings across multiple versions of the package, you can pick the same destination folder for all versions.
segment.target: To keep your settings across multiple versions of the package, you can pick the same destination folder for all versions.

segment.source: The different language versions are then saved in separate subfolders within that destination folder.
segment.target: The different language versions are then saved in separate subfolders within that destination folder.

segment.source: Like, for an English version, and for a German version, .
segment.target: Like, for an English version, and for a German version, .

segment.source: Click Next to go to the Package Type Selection page or Back to go to the Platform Selection page.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the Package Type Selection page or Back to go to the Platform Selection page.
